mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id as postId, p.title, p.content, p.category, p.admin_id as adminId, p.created_at as createdAt, p.updated_at as updatedAt, p.status, p.fix, p.link, pi.file_name as imageUrl FROM post p LEFT JOIN postimages pi ON p.post_id = pi.post_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, content, category, admin_id, link) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{adminId}, #{link});
